name: oldworld-foundryvtt
description: The **official** system for playing *Warhammer: The Old World* on [Foundry VTT](https://foundryvtt.com/). Created by Moo Man.

scripts.build: node scriptPacker.js&& cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup --config rollup.config.mjs --watch
scripts.release: node scriptPacker.js&& cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config rollup.config.mjs&& cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dbpacker.js
